Text: so excellent - thank you for all of the vids you've posted... i can see a boris karloff theme... you don't happen to like vincent price too do you!??! :-)
Yes I love Vincent Price in any movie. He played shady characters in the 1940s before becoming an habitual villian. He played the power-hungry madman better than anyone in his time.
This is not the criterion, altho the quality isn't bad.
